sendreset.success-tip: Your reset password email has been sent, please check it in your email box! If you have not received it, please click the button below to resend!
sendreset.fail-tip: Your reset password email failed to be sent! please click the button below to resend password reset email!

title.signin: Sign in to Leap App Services

send-regemail.success-tip: The verification email has been sent, please check your mail box and click the verification link. If you did not receive the mail in a few minutes, please click the "Resend" button below.
send-regemail.fail-tip: Your password reset email has been sent, please check your mailbox. If you did not receive it in a few minutes, please click the button below to resend.
send-regemail.unknown-tip: Your Email has not verified, please click the button below to send a verification e-mail!

tip.no-permission: Sorry, you have no permission for this module.

login-error.210: The username and password don't match.

error.password-confirm: Confirm password must be the same
error.min-length: The length should be longer than {0}

tips.register: By registering, you agree to ourTerms of UseandPrivacy Policy.

verifyemail.jump: Jump to the login page automatically in seconds
